overview: Tamaar Padaar is the satirical comedy movie directed by scenarist Dileesh Nair. The movie, which stars Prithviraj, Baburaj, Chemban Vinod Jose and Srinda Ashab in central roles, revolves around ACP Pouran, and circus artists Jumber Thambi and Crossbelt Mani who comes into his life.
title: Tamaar Padaar
